QuestData.Title: Talon Strike
QuestData.Description:
With your help, my Blacktalon assassins will cut down the djaradin defending the outer perimeter. Mark any targets with a small stun bomb, and they will come to your aid.
Proceed quickly and eliminate anything that may hinder our advance.
QuestData.RewardText: Our advance is pushing them back! All that remains is to breach the gates.
